doctor.name: Dr. S.M. Zakir Hossain
doctor.info: Dr. S.M. Zakir Hossain is a Dental Doctor in Barisal. His qualification is BDS (Dhaka), PGT (Dhaka), MPH, Fellow (Oral Prosthesis). He is a Dental Surgeon, Dental Surgery at BellView Hospital & Medical Services, Barisal. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at BellView Hospital & Medical Services, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. S.M. Zakir Hossain at BellView Hospital & Medical Services, Barisal is 9am to 2pm & 4pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Saifur Rahman Tushar
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Saifur Rahman Tushar is a Dental Doctor in Barisal. His qualification is BDS (DU), AIC (Malaysia), PGT (Oral Surgery),  MPH (Course). He is a Consultant Surgeon, Dental at Islami Bank Hospital, Barisal. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Labaid Diagnostic, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Saifur Rahman Tushar at Labaid Diagnostic, Barisal is 10am to 1pm & 5pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: K Jahan Center, House # 106, Sadar Road, Barisal

doctor.name: Dr. Farhana Naznin Ratna
doctor.info: Dr. Farhana Naznin Ratna is a Dental Doctor in Barisal. Her qualification is BDS (RAJ). She is a Consultant & Surgeon, Dental at Islami Bank Hospital, Barisal. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Islami Bank Hospital, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Farhana Naznin Ratna at Islami Bank Hospital, Barisal is 3pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).
